name: chatapp
description: This is a full-stack chat application built with **React**, **Node.js**, **Express**, **MongoDB**, and **Socket.IO**. The application allows users to register, log in, and engage in real-time messaging with other users. It also supports features like profile management, image uploads, and theme customization.

scripts.build: npm install --prefix backend && npm install --prefix frontend && npm run build --prefix frontend
